  21:

  49:    , input [cfg_data_width_p-1:0]                cfg_data_i

  51:    // Interrupts
  52:    , input                                       timer_int_i
  53:    , input                                       software_int_i
  54:    , input                                       external_int_i
  55: 
  56:    // Connected to other tiles on east and west

  58:    , output [S:W][coh_noc_ral_link_width_lp-1:0] coh_lce_req_link_o

  67:    , output [S:W][mem_noc_ral_link_width_lp-1:0] mem_cmd_link_o
  68: 
  69:    , input [S:W][mem_noc_ral_link_width_lp-1:0]  mem_resp_link_i
  70:    , output [S:W][mem_noc_ral_link_width_lp-1:0] mem_resp_link_o
  71:    );
  72: 
  73: `declare_bp_common_proc_cfg_s(num_core_p, num_cce_p, num_lce_p)

 386:   logic [coh_noc_cord_width_p-1:0] lce_cord_li;
 387:   bp_me_lce_id_to_cord
 388:    #(.cfg_p(cfg_p))
 389:    router_cord
 390:     (.lce_id_i(proc_cfg_cast_i.icache_id)
 391:      ,.lce_cord_o(lce_cord_li)
 392:      ,.lce_cid_o()
 393:      );

 395:   bsg_wormhole_router
 396:    #(.flit_width_p(coh_noc_flit_width_p)

 399:      ,.len_width_p(coh_noc_len_width_p)
 400:      ,.reverse_order_p(1)
 401:      ,.routing_matrix_p(StrictYX)
 402:      )
 403:    lce_req_router
 404:     (.clk_i(coh_clk_i)

 406: 
 407:      ,.link_i({coh_lce_req_link_i, coh_lce_req_link_li})
 408:      ,.link_o({coh_lce_req_link_o, coh_lce_req_link_lo})
 409: 
 410:      ,.my_cord_i(lce_cord_li)
 411:      );
 412: 
 413:   bsg_wormhole_router
 414:    #(.flit_width_p(coh_noc_flit_width_p)
 415:      ,.dims_p(coh_noc_dims_p)
 416:      ,.cord_markers_pos_p(coh_noc_cord_markers_pos_p)
 417:      ,.len_width_p(coh_noc_len_width_p)
 418:      ,.reverse_order_p(1)
 419:      ,.routing_matrix_p(StrictYX)
 420:      )
 421:    lce_cmd_router
 422:     (.clk_i(coh_clk_i)
 423:      ,.reset_i(coh_reset_i)
 424: 
 425:      ,.link_i({coh_lce_cmd_link_i, coh_lce_cmd_link_li})
 426:      ,.link_o({coh_lce_cmd_link_o, coh_lce_cmd_link_lo})
 427: 
 428:      ,.my_cord_i(lce_cord_li)
 429:      );
 430: 
 431:   bsg_wormhole_router
 432:    #(.flit_width_p(coh_noc_flit_width_p)
 433:      ,.dims_p(coh_noc_dims_p)
 434:      ,.cord_markers_pos_p(coh_noc_cord_markers_pos_p)
 435:      ,.len_width_p(coh_noc_len_width_p)
 436:      ,.reverse_order_p(1)
 437:      ,.routing_matrix_p(StrictYX)
 438:      )
 439:    lce_resp_router
 440:     (.clk_i(coh_clk_i)
 441:      ,.reset_i(coh_reset_i)
 442: 
 443:      ,.link_i({coh_lce_resp_link_i, coh_lce_resp_link_li})
 444:      ,.link_o({coh_lce_resp_link_o, coh_lce_resp_link_lo})
 445: 
 446:      ,.my_cord_i(lce_cord_li)
 447:      );
 448: 
 449:   bsg_wormhole_router
 450:    #(.flit_width_p(mem_noc_flit_width_p)
 451:      ,.dims_p(mem_noc_dims_p)
 452:      ,.cord_markers_pos_p(mem_noc_cord_markers_pos_p)
 453:      ,.len_width_p(mem_noc_len_width_p)
 454:      ,.reverse_order_p(1)
 455:      ,.routing_matrix_p(StrictYX)
 456:      )
 457:    mem_cmd_router 
 458:    (.clk_i(mem_clk_i)
 459:     ,.reset_i(mem_reset_i)
 460:     ,.my_cord_i(my_cord_i)
 461:     ,.link_i({mem_cmd_link_i, mem_cmd_link_li})
 462:     ,.link_o({mem_cmd_link_o, mem_cmd_link_lo})
 463:     );
 464:   
 465:   bsg_wormhole_router
 466:    #(.flit_width_p(mem_noc_flit_width_p)
 467:      ,.dims_p(mem_noc_dims_p)
 468:      ,.cord_markers_pos_p(mem_noc_cord_markers_pos_p)
 469:      ,.len_width_p(mem_noc_len_width_p)
 470:      ,.reverse_order_p(1)
 471:      ,.routing_matrix_p(StrictYX)
 472:      )
 473:    mem_resp_router 
 474:     (.clk_i(mem_clk_i)
 475:      ,.reset_i(mem_reset_i)
 476:      ,.my_cord_i(my_cord_i)
 477:      ,.link_i({mem_resp_link_i, mem_resp_link_li})
 478:      ,.link_o({mem_resp_link_o, mem_resp_link_lo})
 479:      );
 480: 
 481: endmodule
